summary: A young ninja turns his back on the orphanage that raised him, leading to a confrontation with a fellow ninja from the clan.
cast: Rain|Joon Lee|Jonathan Chan-Pensley|Ill-Young Kim|Yuki Iwamoto|Ben Miles|Naomie Harris|Sung Kang|Linh Dan Pham|Fang Yu|Adriana Altaras|Shô Kosugi|Kylie Liya Page|Sungwoong Yoon|Eleonore Weisgerber|Wladimir Tarasjanz|Randall Duk Kim|Kai Fung Rieck|Anna Sawai|Thorston Manderlay|Richard van Weyden|Mina Ghousi|Hans Hohlbein|Rick Yune|Stephen Marcus|Nhi Ngoc Nguyen-Hermann|Guido Foehrweisser|Tim Williams|David Leitch|Wolfgang Stegemann|Steffen Groth|Jens Neuhaus|Patrick Pinheiro|Matthias Schendel|Johannes Ahn|Hélène Cardona|Paul Leonard|Alexander Yassin
title: Ninja Assassin
